title: Crash after champ select due to network error // network connection is fine.
body: on both my accounts i keep getting a network error saying im unable to connect to server but my network is working fine. i dont even care about the leaver busters i just want to play the game. ive tried every fix i could find including the hextech repair tool. please help{{champion:32}}

replies.body: There might be something weird going on with the way your network is trying to route your connection to our servers. Let's double check some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is configured correctly there first. Hit me back up if you still can't get back on the Rift though!

nothing on that list has helped me other than switching to wired connection which i haven't tried. ive played this game on WiFi for 4 years so that cant be the problem, it just started happening evening of 5/19 despite me playing that morning. I've already posted a ticket before this but i haven't received any help
